verses.text: Now \w when|strong="H3427"\w* Saul \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w back|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* fighting \w the|strong="H8033"\w* Philistines, news \w was|strong="H1732"\w* given \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* waste land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* En-gedi.

Now \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* deepest \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hollow.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* David gave Saul \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Saul \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w back|strong="H0310"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; \w but|strong="H0518"\w* David \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w* \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* safe \w place|strong="H1004"\w*.
